game.name: Train Simulator: Hidaka Main Line: Tomakomai - Hidaka-Mombetsu Route Add-On
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 창작마당, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The wonderfully scenic Hokkaido region, by Partner Programme developer Union Workshop, brings the coastal Hidaka Main Line to life!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The wonderfully scenic Hokkaido region, by Partner Programme developer Union Workshop, brings the coastal Hidaka Main Line to life!
